statements: SELECT * FROM survey_feedback;
SELECT customer_name, satisfaction_rating FROM survey_feedback WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, smart_appliance_type FROM survey_feedback WHERE smart_appliance_type = 'Refrigerator';
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name FROM survey_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text FROM survey_feedback WHERE feedback_text IS NOT NULL;
SELECT customer_name, satisfaction_rating, feedback_text FROM survey_feedback WHERE satisfaction_rating > 3 ORDER BY customer_name ASC
SELECT customer_name, smart_appliance_type FROM survey_feedback WHERE smart_appliance_type = 'Washing Machine' ORDER BY customer_name DESC
SELECT customer_name, satisfaction_rating, feedback_text FROM survey_feedback WHERE feedback_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY satisfaction_rating DESC
SELECT * FROM survey_feedback WHERE customer_name LIKE '%John%' OR feedback_text LIKE '%good%' ORDER BY feedback_id ASC
SELECT customer_name, satisfaction_rating FROM survey_feedback WHERE satisfaction_rating < 3 ORDER BY satisfaction_rating ASC, customer_name DESC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, appliance_id, rating FROM feedback WHERE appliance_id = 10;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, phone_number, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '%555%';
SELECT * FROM feedback WHERE rating >= 4 ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, appliance_id, rating FROM customers INNER JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_date, rating FROM customers JOIN feedback ON customers.customer_id = feedback.customer_id WHERE rating < 3 ORDER BY feedback_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Survey_Response;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customer;
SELECT appliance_id, appliance_type, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM Appliance;
SELECT customer_id, appliance_id, feedback FROM Survey_Response WHERE survey_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_name, appliance_type, purchase_date FROM Customer JOIN Appliance ON Customer.customer_id = Appliance.appliance_id;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customer;
SELECT appliance_type, manufacturer, purchase_date FROM Appliance WHERE warranty_period > 2;
SELECT feedback, survey_date FROM Survey_Response WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT * FROM Customer JOIN Survey_Response ON Customer.customer_id = Survey_Response.customer_id;

SELECT customer_name, appliance_type, feedback FROM Customer JOIN Survey_Response ON Customer.customer_id = Survey_Response.customer_id JOIN Appliance ON Survey_Response.appliance_id = Appliance.appliance_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback;
SELECT customer_name, rating, feedback_text FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT product_name, brand, category, price FROM SmartAppliances WHERE price < 500;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT feedback_id, customer_name, product_id FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM CustomerFeedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT customer_name, feedback_text, rating FROM CustomerFeedback WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM SmartAppliances WHERE price < 500.00 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM Customers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' AND email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT cr.customer_name, cr.email, sr.survey_date, sr.satisfaction_level FROM Customers cr JOIN SurveyResponses sr ON cr.customer_id = sr.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT appliance_name, manufacturer FROM appliances ORDER BY appliance_name ASC;
SELECT feedback_score, response_id FROM feedback_scores WHERE feedback_score > 3;
SELECT survey_id, survey_name, survey_description FROM surveys;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT appliance_name, manufacturer FROM appliances WHERE appliance_id = 3;
SELECT feedback_score FROM feedback_scores WHERE response_id = 5 ORDER BY feedback_score DESC;
SELECT survey_name, survey_description FROM surveys;
